name: Custom Candle
short_description: You can represent a candle from any timeframe greater than the current one, for example if you are on a 15-minute timeframe you can draw a daily candle.

params.title: Custom Candle x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Candle TimeFrame
params.content: The candle you want to draw, must be greater than the current timeframe

params.title: Candle Mode
params.content: You can choose to display only Open/Close or High/Low

params.title: Fibonacci (high/low)
params.content: You can choose whether to display Fibonacci, only with High/Low mode

params.title: Candle To Show
params.content: The number of candles to be drawn on the chart

params.title: Line Style Box
params.content: The type of box perimeter line representing the candle

params.title: Tichness
params.content: The thickness of the line in the previous parameter

params.title: Boxed ?
params.content: You can draw a box or just its levels

params.title: Fill Box ?
params.content: You can fill the candle with the same color or leave it empty
